title: shares with the same name not shown in 5.0.7 rc, 5.0.7, 5.0.8, 5.0.9 and 5.0.10
body:
update: added all versions i could reproduce the bug with
update2. added 5.0.9 as affected and a hint that the folders must also be shared from the same user.
update3: added 5.0.10 as affected and a hint about the order of sharing
update4: added 5.0.11 as affected

affected owncloud versions: 5.0.7 rc, 5.0.7, 5.0.8, 5.0.9, 5.0.10, 5.0.11

**problem**
if user a gets two shares with the same name from the same user only one of them is visible in the shared folder. user a gets no notification about that. shares with the same name but from different users are displayed as expected.

the problem does not occur in 5.0.6.


**how to reproduce**
* user b creates the following folder structure:
     1: `clientsync/test/folder1.txt`
     2: `clientsync/foo/test/folder2.txt`
the two txt files will only help us to see which folder is shown later on.

* user b shares first "test" folder 1  to user a and then "test" folder 2.

**result:** user a can only see one of them.

* now user b unshares the folder, that is visible to user a.

**result:** user a can see the missing folder now.

if user b shares first "test" folder 2 and then "test" folder 1 to user a, both are visible to user a.

**expected result**
both shares should be visible and accessible. no matter in which order the are shared. the name of the second share should be expanded for user a like "test (2)" as in 5.0.6.
